statements.select:
SELECT [order_num],[checkcode],[u_type],[u_name],[u_nicker],[phase_id],[phase],[bet_time],[odds_id],[category],[play_name],[play_id],[bet_val],[bet_wt],[odds],[amount],[profit],[hy_drawback],[dl_drawback],[zd_drawback],[gd_drawback],[fgs_drawback],[zj_drawback],[dl_rate],[zd_rate],[gd_rate],[fgs_rate],[zj_rate],[dl_name],[zd_name],[gd_name],[fgs_name],[is_payment],[sale_type],[m_type],[kind],[ip],[lottery_type],[lottery_name],[ordervalidcode],[odds_zj] FROM [dbo].[cz_bet_kc] WHERE 1 = 1 AND ($where$)
order by $OrderBy$

SELECT
Top (#Top#)
[order_num],[checkcode],[u_type],[u_name],[u_nicker],[phase_id],[phase],[bet_time],[odds_id],[category],[play_name],[play_id],[bet_val],[bet_wt],[odds],[amount],[profit],[hy_drawback],[dl_drawback],[zd_drawback],[gd_drawback],[fgs_drawback],[zj_drawback],[dl_rate],[zd_rate],[gd_rate],[fgs_rate],[zj_rate],[dl_name],[zd_name],[gd_name],[fgs_name],[is_payment],[sale_type],[m_type],[kind],[ip],[lottery_type],[lottery_name],[ordervalidcode],[odds_zj] FROM [dbo].[cz_bet_kc] WHERE 1 = 1 AND ($where$)
order by $OrderBy$
